name: Of Goose And Men
description:
A game-and-watch style game for the 21st century.

2 player coop (or 1 player ambitious).

Peasant: A/D keys. Catch eggs and hand them to Goose! Keep pushing that direction when Goose is ready to hand it off. Don't let the eggs hit the ground!
Goose: Left/Right keys. Dodge the greedy robbers to get your eggs back to the nest!
Escape key: exit
F key: toggle fullscreen
P key: toggle pause

Post your high score!

Credits:
Matt Woelk - Programming and Animation
Alex Sheludchenko - Art Direction and Art Production
Dan Bergman - Sound Design
Kristofer Isaak - Music Composition and Production
